summary: Portland is Maine's largest city, with about 68,000 residents. It is known for its history in shipping and has a busy seaport. The city's name comes from the English Isle of Portland, and it is famous for its seal, showing a phoenix rising from ashes, symbolizing its recovery from big fires. Portland, Oregon, was even named after this city! Today, Portland's economy is mostly based on services, and it is becoming a hub for creative industries, which is also changing the city's neighborhoods.
title: Portland, Maine
